tool_description: Translate from English to Pirate Speak. The best translator of all. I be needin' t' send 'em all to Davy Jones' locker. So send your texts my way buxsome beauty! Arrrrr!
name: Pirate Translator
title: Pirate Translator

api_list.name: Pirate Speak Translator

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.description: Text to convert to pirate speak.
required_parameters.default: Hello sir! my mother goes with me to the ocean.
